data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Taraba, Nigeria. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Taraba, Nigeria

data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 1,480,600 citizens of the the state of Taraba.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Taraba, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Father, help the 381,438 believers in Taraba to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 1,099,162 lost friends and neighbors.
Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Ndunda people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, please give the church in the state of Taraba prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Taraba to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.section_summary:
the state of Taraba, Nigeria has a population of 1,480,600.

We estimate Taraba has 381,438 people who might know Jesus, 376,774 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 722,388 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Taraba, Nigeria.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

location.name: Taraba
location.people_groups_list: Chamba Daka, Jibu, Kirya-Konzel, Bukwen, Teme
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Chamba Daka (186,000), Jibu (58,000), Kirya-Konzel (7,300), Bukwen (1,100), Teme (5,900)
